formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of a saved SCM configuration.

formElement.label: Path to Vault.exe
formElement.documentation: Fill here path to vault.exe e.g. C:\Program Files\SourceGear\Fortress\Vault.exe

formElement.label: Repository Folder
formElement.documentation: Folder path in vault. e.g. $/somefolder. This needs to always start with $/ and the plugin checks changes in this given folder only (recursively)

formElement.label: Quiet time minutes:
formElement.documentation: The number of minutes of no check-in activity required before launching the procedure.

formElement.label: Enabled for ElectricSentry:
formElement.documentation: Enable for continuous integration monitoring by ElectricSentry.
